# code

**Instance Property**

The error code for this instance.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute ApplePayErrorCode code;
```

## Discussion

For the possible values, see [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayErrorCode].

## Error Properties

- **contactField**: The field name that contains the error on the payment sheet.
- **message**: A localized, user-facing string that describes the error.
